markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Sepoko](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2277)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Sepoko](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2277)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Boggard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=209" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 159</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Boggard](/Languages.aspx?ID=27)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 hide armor_](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)_, [silver religious symbol of Gogunta](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 200

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_mace_ +22 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** tongue grab

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309)
- **4th**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **5th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **6th**
[Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×5), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323)

**Cleric Domain Spells 2 Focus Points,** DC 30
- **6th**
[Commanding Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=408), [Touch of Obedience](/Spells.aspx?ID=459)

**Divine Font**   As cleric (harm).

**Inveigled Sepoko**   has been inveigled by the naga Ngara. This effect can be removed with [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (6th level; counteract DC 31).

**Swamp Stride**   A boggard warrior ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features.

**Terrifying Croak** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The boggard warrior unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 1 unless they succeed at a DC 30 Will save; those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

**Tongue Grab**   If the boggard warrior hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the boggard. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 27 and dealing at least 14 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

</column>
name: Sepoko

Inveigled Sepoko has been inveigled by the naga Ngara. This effect can be removed with dispel magic (6th level; counteract DC 31). Swamp Stride A boggard warrior ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features. Terrifying Croak Single Action (Auditory, Emotion, Fear, Mental) The boggard warrior unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet becomes frightened 1 unless they succeed at a DC 30 Will save; those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute. Tongue Grab If the boggard warrior hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes grabbed by the boggard. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't immobilized, but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 27 and dealing at least 14 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.
